ComicInfo.Title: Shifts and Planes
ComicInfo.Summary: Shifts and Planes: Spider-Man and Starfox are off to another dimension to destroy a machine that is preventing Captain Marvel from reverting from her energy form. They problematically discover, however, that the machine is being utilized by a peace loving tribe to protect them from their war loving rivals. Spider-Man and Starfox have to face off with Will-Killer and his Mahko Clan to negate the threat to Sondia and her people.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:50:21. [Issue ID 38894]
